faqs.question: What is the usual process for taking possession of a new flat
faqs.answer: Once the sale deed is registered and the full payment is made the developer or previous owner will hand over possession. faqs.question: How does the size of a 3 BHK flat affect maintenance charges

These fees cover common area upkeep security services power backup and amenity usage ensuring the complex remains pristine.
